### isAlignedBarrier() {#a79dea56e8e62d80d48cddd4319a55380}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>bool AANoSync::isAlignedBarrier (<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/aarch64/aarch64promoteconstant-cpp/#a90f8350fecae261c25be85d38b451bff">const</a> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/callbase">CallBase</a> &amp; CB, bool ExecutedAligned)</>}
  labels = {["static"]}>
Helper function to determine if <code>CB</code> is an aligned (GPU) barrier.

---------------------— NoSync <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/function">Function</a> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/attribute">Attribute</a> ----------------------—

Aligned barriers have to be executed by all threads. The flag <code>ExecutedAligned</code> indicates if the call is executed by all threads in a (thread) block in an aligned way. If that is the case, non-aligned barriers are effectively aligned barriers.

Declaration at line <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/transforms/include/llvm/transforms/ipo/attributor-h/#l03577">3577</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/transforms/include/llvm/transforms/ipo/attributor-h">Attributor.h</a>, definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/transforms/lib/transforms/ipo/attributorattributes-cpp/#l02153">2153</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/transforms/lib/transforms/ipo/attributorattributes-cpp">AttributorAttributes.cpp</a>.
</MemberDefinition>

### isNonRelaxedAtomic() {#ac04222d8711a686794d15456445dd4fb}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>bool AANoSync::isNonRelaxedAtomic (<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/aarch64/aarch64promoteconstant-cpp/#a90f8350fecae261c25be85d38b451bff">const</a> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/instruction">Instruction</a> &#42; I)</>}
  labels = {["static"]}>
Helper function used to determine whether an instruction is non-relaxed atomic.

In other words, if an atomic instruction does not have unordered or monotonic ordering

Declaration at line <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/transforms/include/llvm/transforms/ipo/attributor-h/#l03567">3567</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/transforms/include/llvm/transforms/ipo/attributor-h">Attributor.h</a>, definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/transforms/lib/transforms/ipo/attributorattributes-cpp/#l02170">2170</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/transforms/lib/transforms/ipo/attributorattributes-cpp">AttributorAttributes.cpp</a>.
</MemberDefinition>

### isNoSyncIntrinsic() {#af5126302d811937f43d1b3909e7a564d}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>bool AANoSync::isNoSyncIntrinsic (<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/aarch64/aarch64promoteconstant-cpp/#a90f8350fecae261c25be85d38b451bff">const</a> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/instruction">Instruction</a> &#42; I)</>}
  labels = {["static"]}>
Helper function specific for intrinsics which are potentially volatile.

Return true if this intrinsic is nosync.

This is only used for intrinsics which would be nosync except that they have a volatile flag. All other intrinsics are simply annotated with the nosync attribute in Intrinsics.td.

Declaration at line <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/transforms/include/llvm/transforms/ipo/attributor-h/#l03570">3570</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/transforms/include/llvm/transforms/ipo/attributor-h">Attributor.h</a>, definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/transforms/lib/transforms/ipo/attributorattributes-cpp/#l02206">2206</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/transforms/lib/transforms/ipo/attributorattributes-cpp">AttributorAttributes.cpp</a>.
</MemberDefinition>
